Advertisers give us advertisements and tell us the type of audience they want to reach (for example, males over 35 years old).
Camfrog displays the advertisement to users meeting the specified criteria.
In our role of delivering targeted advertisements, Camfrog plays the middleman.
In this process, the advertiser never has access to individual user information.

These companies may use information (not including personal information such as your name, address email address or telephone number) about your visits to this and other web sites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you.
